Recipe Site.description: A glitchy, experimental recipe site design. Side effects may include: eye strain, wonky formatting, confusion.

Corporation Site.description: A mock landing page for a very trustworthy CORPORATION. Warning: contains frightening elements.

Rock Paper Scissors.description: The Rock-Paper-Scissors game you know and love, now playable against a computer opponent.

Pixel Sketchr.description: Make pixel art right in your web browser and then blow it away like a digital sand mandala. Note: this app is for entertainment purposes only.

Calculator.description: Get all the answers to your arithmetic questions and enjoy the immersive retro vibes of this aesthetic math app. You may even find a couple secrets along the way.

Service Sign Up.description: Sign up for a very real service with this realistic simulation of everyone's favorite web activity.

Tic-Tac-Toe.description: Try your luck against our custom made unbeatable AI in the classic X and O placing game. Features charming, handcrafted graphics.
